name: DIY Slime Maker 2! ASMR Fun
description:
Brace yourself for the best slime making experience of your life with this exciting game. If you want to enjoy some core-shaking slimy, jiggly fun, you’re in for a treat. Viscous, runny, glittery, smooth jelly, glinting mischievously, beckoning you to take its crazy fluffy goodness in your palms. Imagine the oozy liquid smoothly and softly skimming your skin, to send quivers of oddly satisfying pleasure down your spine. Our new venture brings to you a range of groundbreaking, never-seen-before activities such as ASMR slime making, squishing, pressing, poking, jiggling and stretching to beat the stress out of you. Become an expert crazy fluffy slime maker and churn out unicorn slime, using glitters and sparkle. You can have a good laugh at yourself with slime fails. Paint your creation in every color of the rainbow and beyond. It’s a slime game for girls and boys of all ages that will teach them slime mixing within the confines of their homes using DIY hacks. Your complete guide on how to make slime step by step that is easy to follow.
Make homemade slime using most popular recipes across the internet using different ingredients like borax, glue, shampoo, shaving foam, soap, guar gum and all the common items easily found at home. If you enjoy popular trends like mixing all my slime smoothies, or are up for a slime challenge then this is just the thing for you.

Learn real life applicable recipes of making slime at home. Make this squishy fluffy viscous and crazy toy yourself now and enjoy all the real jelly slime fun activities in this anti stress game.

Make DIY Slime with these famous recipes:
1) DIY Toothpaste fluffy slime
2) Learn how to make Slime with glue, shaving foam and borax
3) DIY clear jiggly jelly slime using glue and water
4) Clay Slime & Clear putty Glitter Slime Making
5) Also learn how to make easy slime without borax
6) Rainbow, Glitter and Unicorn slime using rainbow unicorn colors and sparkling glitters in gold and silver colors.

Enjoy most satisfying & amazing ASMR activities like:
Oddly satisfying Fun to do fluffy slime mixing activity.
Giant Slime Poking using fingers with relaxing ASMR real sounds.
ASMR Slime stretching using 2 hands
Destroy jelly slime with racket
Bouncy Slime Jiggling
Press your Fluffy slime like a squishy ball to release the stress out of you.
Funny Slime fails when you play excessively with it.
You can enjoy all these fun activities with glitter slime, crunchy slime & lipstick slime.

Download this best new and out of the world anti stress slime making game for girls and boys with all possible fun after which you won’t be needing a slime in real life
